data.name: EmailAddressBeingUsed
data.value: The email address '{0}' is being used.

data.name: UsernameNotAvailable
data.value: The username '{0}' is not available.

data.name: UsernameAndPasswordNotFound
data.value: A unique user with that username or email address and password does not exist. Try logging on with your username if you were using an email address to log on.

data.name: PackageIdNotAvailable
data.value: The package ID '{0}' is not available.

data.name: PackageWithIdAndVersionNotFound
data.value: A package with id '{0}' and version '{1}' does not exist.

data.name: NuGetPackagePropertyTooLong
data.value: A nuget package's {0} property may not be more than {1} characters long.

data.name: ApiKeyNotAuthorized
data.value: The specified API key is invalid or does not have permission to access the specified package.

data.name: PackageExistsAndCannotBeModified
data.value: A package with id '{0}' and version '{1}' already exists and cannot be modified.

data.name: CurrentPasswordIncorrect
data.value: The current password you provided is incorrect.

data.name: UserIsNotYetConfirmed
data.value: You cannot reset your password until you confirm your account.

data.name: SSLRequired
data.value: The requested resource can only be accessed via SSL.

data.name: FailedToReadUploadFile
data.value: Failed to read the package file. Ensure it is a valid NuGet package with a valid manifest.

data.name: UploadFileIsRequired
data.value: A package file is required.

data.name: UploadFileMustBeNuGetPackage
data.value: The file must be a .nupkg file.

data.name: SuccessfullyUploadedPackage
data.value: You successfully uploaded {0} {1}.

data.name: PackageWithIdDoesNotExist
data.value: No package with this ID exists.

data.name: PackageIsAlreadyCurated
data.value: The package is already curated.

data.name: InvalidApiKey
data.value: The API key '{0}' is invalid.

data.name: ParameterCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: '{0}' cannot be null or an empty string

data.name: DatabaseUnavailable_TrySpecificVersion
data.value: The NuGet service is experiencing a service interruption. Try requesting a specific package version instead.

data.name: UserNotFound
data.value: A user with the provided user name does not exist.

data.name: ApiKeyUserAccountIsUnconfirmed
data.value: You must confirm the email address for the account in order to use the API key.

data.name: MultipleMatchingCredentials
data.value: Multiple Credentials match '{0}' credential with Key {1}

data.name: PasswordCredentialsCannotBeUsedHere
data.value: Password credentials cannot be used with Authenticate(Credential). Use Authenticate(string, string) instead.

data.name: ApiKeyRequired
data.value: An API key must be provided in the 'X-NuGet-ApiKey' header to use this service

data.name: Unauthorized
data.value: User is not authorized

data.name: MicrosoftAccount_SignInMessage
data.value: Sign in with a Microsoft account

data.name: MissingRequiredConfigurationValue
data.value: Missing required configuration value: '{0}'

data.name: UnknownAuthenticationProvider
data.value: Unknown authentication provider: '{0}'

data.name: ExternalAccountLinkExpired
data.value: Your external account credential expired or you did not allow us access to your account. Try logging in again.

data.name: MicrosoftAccount_AccountNoun
data.value: Microsoft account

data.name: CredentialType_ApiKey
data.value: API Key

data.name: CredentialType_Password
data.value: Password

data.name: MicrosoftAccount_Caption
data.value: Microsoft account

data.name: ApiKeyReset
data.value: Your API Key has been reset, check the new value below.

data.name: CannotRemoveOnlyLoginCredential
data.value: Oops! You can't remove the only credential that can be used to log in to the website!

data.name: CredentialRemoved
data.value: The external account has been removed

data.name: PasswordChanged
data.value: Your password has been changed

data.name: PasswordRemoved
data.value: Your password has been removed

data.name: PasswordSet
data.value: Your password has been set

data.name: Emails_ForgotPassword_Body
data.value:
The word on the street is you lost your password. Sorry to hear it! If you haven't forgotten your password you can safely ignore this email. Your password has not been changed.
Click the following link within the next {0} hours to reset your password:
[{1}]({1})
Thanks, The {2} Team

data.name: Emails_ForgotPassword_Subject
data.value: [{0}] Please reset your password.

data.name: Emails_SetPassword_Body
data.value:
The word on the street is you want to set a password for your account. If you didn't request a password, you can safely ignore this message. A password has not yet been set.
Click the following link within the next {0} hours to set your password:
[{1}]({1})
Thanks, The {2} Team

data.name: Emails_SetPassword_Subject
data.value: [{0}] Please set your password.

data.name: Emails_CredentialAdded_Body
data.value: A {0} was added to your account and can now be used to log in. If you did not request this change, please reply to this email to contact support.

data.name: Emails_CredentialAdded_Subject
data.value: [{0}] {1} added to your account

data.name: Emails_CredentialRemoved_Body
data.value: A {0} was removed from your account and can no longer be used to log in. If you did not request this change, please reply to this email to contact support.

data.name: Emails_CredentialRemoved_Subject
data.value: [{0}] {1} removed from your account

data.name: MessageService_CannotSendEmailForCredential
data.value: Cannot send added/removed email for credentials of type '{0}'

data.name: AlreadyLoggedIn
data.value: You are already logged in!

data.name: AuthenticationProviderDisabled
data.value: The '{0}' authentication provider is disabled and cannot be used to authenticate

data.name: EmailPreferencesUpdated
data.value: Your email preferences have been updated

data.name: EmailUpdated
data.value: Your new email address was saved!

data.name: EmailUpdated_ConfirmationRequired
data.value: Your email address has been changed! We sent a confirmation email to verify your new email. When you confirm the new email address, it will take effect and we will forget the old one.

data.name: UploadPackage_MinClientVersionOutOfRange
data.value: This package requires version '{0}' of NuGet, which this gallery does not currently support. Please contact us if you have questions.

data.name: DefaultUserSafeExceptionMessage
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Contact support for assistance.

data.name: CancelEmailAddress
data.value: You canceled your email address change request.

data.name: UploadPackage_InvalidNuspec
data.value: The NuGet package contains an invaid .nuspec file. The error encountered was:'{0}'. Correct the error and try again.
